In England, in the seven days to 05 July, there were 161,338 new confirmed cases (286.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 June, there were 107,775 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 50% (53,563 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 10 July is 4,422,370 (7,856.8 cases per 100,000 population).
